00:00:23,840 --> 00:00:27,199
亲自将骨灵冷火传与萧炎

8
00:00:27,960 --> 00:00:30,319
而随后令人感到意外的是

9
00:00:30,600 --> 00:00:33,359
旧识纳兰媽然为了老师云韵

10
00:00:33,560 --> 00:00:35,599
竟然前来求助萧炎

11
00:00:36,600 --> 00:00:39,030
萧炎念及旧友之情

12
00:00:39,040 --> 00:00:41,599
同时也为了给星陨阁笼络盟友

13
00:00:41,960 --> 00:00:43,959
当即决定前往花宗

14
00:01:03,080 --> 00:01:03,359
骨灵冷火跟了老师这么多年

15
00:01:05,519 --> 00:01:08,399
不知道这抗性什么时候才能彻底消除

16
00:01:08,720 --> 00:01:09,519
萧炎少爷

17
00:01:10,120 --> 00:01:11,119
我们快到花宗了

18
00:01:13,080 --> 00:01:14,639
看来我修炼结束得正是时候

19
00:01:16,000 --> 00:01:16,879
青鳞说得没错

20
00:01:17,520 --> 00:01:20,359
不过我们也只是刚刚抵达花宗外围而已

21
00:01:42,600 --> 00:01:42,999
跟我来

22
00:01:53,520 --> 00:01:54,679
真是别有洞天

23
00:01:58,160 --> 00:01:59,239
好漂亮的地方

24
00:02:38,080 --> 00:02:39,119
这是护宗迷魂阵

25
00:02:39,960 --> 00:02:41,159
若有人擅闯花宗

26
00:02:41,560 --> 00:02:43,079
便会迷失在这片花海中

27
00:02:45,440 --> 00:02:46,319
比试快要开始了

28
00:02:48,720 --> 00:02:49,839
你们切记跟紧我

29
00:03:11,640 --> 00:03:12,519
时辰到了

30
00:03:26,400 --> 00:03:27,279
是云韵长老

31
00:03:27,520 --> 00:03:28,479
云韵长老来了

32
00:03:54,880 --> 00:03:55,439
云韵

33
00:03:56,160 --> 00:03:57,839
本宗当初好心收留你

34
00:03:58,840 --> 00:04:02,359
没想到你竟还妄想染指我花宗宗主之位

35
00:04:03,840 --> 00:04:04,959
宗主收留之情

36
00:04:05,400 --> 00:04:06,559
云韵铭记在心

37
00:04:07,240 --> 00:04:08,919
但我对宗主之位毫无念想

38
00:04:09,640 --> 00:04:10,999
你又何必苦苦相逼

39
00:04:13,800 --> 00:04:16,439
既然云韵是花婆婆看重之人

40
00:04:17,079 --> 00:04:18,279
你应放下争端

41
00:04:18,600 --> 00:04:19,919
以宗门利益为重

42
00:04:22,320 --> 00:04:25,519
想必花婆婆是被她惺惺作态所骗

43
00:04:26,280 --> 00:04:30,919
况且花宗老宗主的斗气怎能交予一个外人

44
00:04:33,520 --> 00:04:34,359
若真无念想

45
00:04:34,960 --> 00:04:37,639
就乖乖把老宗主的毕生斗气交出来

46
00:04:40,760 --> 00:04:42,319
若早知花婆婆是老宗主

47
00:04:43,040 --> 00:04:44,519
我定会将此事票告宗门

48
00:04:45,880 --> 00:04:48,479
那斗气已被花婆婆封印在我体内

49
00:04:49,160 --> 00:04:49,959
你若想要

50
00:04:50,320 --> 00:04:51,319
来取便是
"},{"role":"assistant","content":"Berikut adalah terjemahan subtitle dalam format SRT:

1
00:00:07,320 --> 00:00:09,319
Yao Chen berhasil membentuk kembali tubuh fisiknya.

2
00:00:09,440 --> 00:00:11,119
Naik ke level Ban Sheng.

3
00:00:11,520 --> 00:00:14,199
Menghancurkan Eighth Heavenly Venerate dan Ninth Heavenly Venerate dari Hall of Soul.

4
00:00:14,320 --> 00:00:16,399
Mengatasi krisis Starfall Pavilion.

5
00:00:17,200 --> 00:00:20,639
Menghadapi muridnya, Xiao Yan, yang telah berkorban segalanya untuk menyelamatkannya.

6
00:00:20,840 --> 00:00:23,479
Yao Chen merasa sangat terharu dan bersyukur.

7
00:00:23,840 --> 00:00:27,199
Dia secara pribadi mewariskan Chilling Bone Flame kepada Xiao Yan.

8
00:00:27,960 --> 00:00:30,319
Namun kemudian, sesuatu yang tak terduga terjadi.

9
00:00:30,600 --> 00:00:33,359
Nalan Yanran, teman lamanya, demi gurunya Yun Yun.

10
00:00:33,560 --> 00:00:35,599
Datang meminta bantuan Xiao Yan.

11
00:00:36,600 --> 00:00:39,030
Xiao Yan mengingat persahabatan mereka dulu.

12
00:00:39,040 --> 00:00:41,599
Sekaligus untuk memperluas aliansi Starfall Pavilion.

13
00:00:41,960 --> 00:00:43,959
Dia langsung memutuskan pergi ke Flower Sect.

14
00:01:03,080 --> 00:01:03,359
Chilling Bone Flame sudah bersama guru selama bertahun-tahun.

15
00:01:05,519 --> 00:01:08,399
Aku penasaran kapan resistensi ini akan benar-benar hilang.

16
00:01:08,720 --> 00:01:09,519
Tuan Xiao Yan.

17
00:01:10,120 --> 00:01:11,119
Kita hampir sampai di Flower Sect.

18
00:01:13,080 --> 00:01:14,639
Sepertinya waktu latihanku berakhir tepat waktu.

19
00:01:16,000 --> 00:01:16,879
Qing Ling benar.

20
00:01:17,520 --> 00:01:20,359
Tapi kita baru sampai di pinggiran Flower Sect.

21
00:01:42,600 --> 00:01:42,999
Ikuti aku.

22
00:01:53,520 --> 00:01:54,679
Benar-benar tempat yang unik.

23
00:01:58,160 --> 00:01:59,239
Tempat yang indah.

24
00:02:38,080 --> 00:02:39,119
Ini Formasi Pelindung Sect.

25
00:02:39,960 --> 00:02:41,159
Jika ada yang masuk tanpa izin.

26
00:02:41,560 --> 00:02:43,079
Mereka akan tersesat di lautan bunga ini.

27
00:02:45,440 --> 00:02:46,319
Ujian akan segera dimulai.

28
00:02:48,720 --> 00:02:49,839
Ingat, tetap dekat denganku.

29
00:03:11,640 --> 00:03:12,519
Waktunya tiba.

30
00:03:26,400 --> 00:03:27,279
Itu Tetua Yun Yun.

31
00:03:27,520 --> 00:03:28,479
Tetua Yun Yun datang.

32
00:03:54,880 --> 00:03:55,439
Yun Yun.

33
00:03:56,160 --> 00:03:57,839
Awalnya sect ini menerimamu dengan baik.

34
00:03:58,840 --> 00:04:02,359
Tak kusangka kau berani mengincar posisi Ketua Flower Sect.

35
00:04:03,840 --> 00:04:04,959
Atas kebaikan Ketua menerimaku.

36
00:04:05,400 --> 00:04:06,559
Yun Yun selalu ingat.

37
00:04:07,240 --> 00:04:08,919
Tapi aku tak pernah mengincar posisi Ketua.

38
00:04:09,640 --> 00:04:10,999
Mengapa kau terus memaksaku?

39
00:04:13,800 --> 00:04:16,439
Karena Yun Yun adalah orang yang dihormati Nenek Hua.

40
00:04:17,079 --> 00:04:18,279
Kau harus mengakhiri perselisihan ini.

41
00:04:18,600 --> 00:04:19,919
Utamakan kepentingan sect.

42
00:04:22,320 --> 00:04:25,519
Nenek Hua pasti tertipu oleh kepura-puraannya.

43
00:04:26,280 --> 00:04:30,919
Lagipula, Dou Qi mantan Ketua tak boleh diberikan ke orang luar.

44
00:04:33,520 --> 00:04:34,359
Jika benar tak mengincar.

45
00:04:34,960 --> 00:04:37,639
Serahkan saja Dou Qi seumur hidup mantan Ketua.

46
00:04:40,760 --> 00:04:42,319
Andai tahu Nenek Hua adalah mantan Ketua.

47
00:04:43,040 --> 00:04:44,519
Aku pasti akan melaporkan ke sect.

48
00:04:45,880 --> 00:04:48,479
Dou Qi itu sudah disegel Nenek Hua dalam tubuhku.

49
00:04:49,160 --> 00:04:49,959
Jika kau mau.

50
00:04:50,320 --> 00:04:51,319
Ambil saja sendiri."},{"role":"user","content":"51
00:04:53,200 --> 00:04:54,599
这可是你自找的

52
00:05:09,680 --> 00:05:10,959
你以代宗主自居

53
00:05:11,400 --> 00:05:12,479
却以多欺少

54
00:05:13,200 --> 00:05:14,999
也不怕别人笑掉大牙

55
00:05:17,760 --> 00:05:18,399
萧炎

56
00:05:18,920 --> 00:05:20,839
你 你怎么来了

57
00:05:24,000 --> 00:05:24,759
是嫣然

58
00:05:26,120 --> 00:05:26,919
相识一场

59
00:05:27,520 --> 00:05:28,319
你遇到麻烦

60
00:05:28,560 --> 00:05:29,839
我总不能袖手旁观吧

61
00:05:31,520 --> 00:05:33,399
这 这人是谁啊

62
00:05:33,800 --> 00:05:34,999
看来是云韵的朋友

63
00:05:35,120 --> 00:05:36,359
实力很强的样子

64
00:05:39,400 --> 00:05:39,919
云韵

65
00:05:40,520 --> 00:05:42,239
你还说对宗主之位没有念想

66
00:05:42,600 --> 00:05:43,759
连帮手都找来了

67
00:05:44,840 --> 00:05:45,599
也罢

68
00:05:46,160 --> 00:05:47,559
那就你二人一起上

69
00:05:48,120 --> 00:05:49,919
免得有人说我们以多欺少

70
00:05:51,720 --> 00:05:52,119
萧炎

71
00:05:52,720 --> 00:05:53,959
你不用来蹭这浑水的

72
00:05:55,120 --> 00:05:55,559
放心吧

73
00:05:56,120 --> 00:05:57,919
详细情况媽然都和我说过了

74
00:06:01,600 --> 00:06:02,319
要比试

75
00:06:02,680 --> 00:06:03,519
我自然没问题

76
00:06:04,120 --> 00:06:05,199
不过无论输赢

77
00:06:05,520 --> 00:06:06,199
你们都没有任何损失

78
00:06:07,200 --> 00:06:08,159
未免太可笑

79
00:06:09,800 --> 00:06:10,199
这样吧

80
00:06:10,880 --> 00:06:11,599
若你们输了

81
00:06:12,200 --> 00:06:14,639
花宗宗主之位就交给云韵

82
00:06:16,520 --> 00:06:17,599
你算什么东西

83
00:06:17,840 --> 00:06:19,119
也配跟我提条件

84
00:06:20,520 --> 00:06:22,199
花宗如此盛气凌人

85
00:06:22,680 --> 00:06:24,439
真当我星陨阁无人不成

86
00:06:26,520 --> 00:06:27,639
你是星陨阁的人

87
00:06:29,520 --> 00:06:30,319
在下萧炎

88
00:06:30,600 --> 00:06:31,679
星陨阁少阁主

89
00:06:32,120 --> 00:06:32,799
家师药尘

90
00:06:33,760 --> 00:06:34,399
此行出来

91
00:06:34,680 --> 00:06:35,319
老师吩咐我

92
00:06:35,840 --> 00:06:37,559
若遇见花宗青仙子前辈

93
00:06:37,960 --> 00:06:38,799
代他问一声好

94
00:06:40,040 --> 00:06:41,799
他竟然就是星陨阁少阁主

95
00:06:42,160 --> 00:06:44,119
太上长老青仙子和药尊者

96
00:06:44,520 --> 00:06:45,559
关系可不一般啊

97
00:06:46,320 --> 00:06:47,839
原来是药尊者的弟子

98
00:06:48,640 --> 00:06:49,519
他有心了

99
00:06:50,280 --> 00:06:51,519
日后若有机会

100
00:06:51,800 --> 00:06:55,239
我定会向太上长老青仙子转达问候
"},{"role":"assistant","content":"51  
00:04:53,200 --> 00:04:54,599  
Ini kau yang minta!  

52  
00:05:09,680 --> 00:05:10,959  
Kau mengaku sebagai Ketua Sementara,  

53  
00:05:11,400 --> 00:05:12,479  
tapi menindas dengan jumlah personel,  

54  
00:05:13,200 --> 00:05:14,999  
tidak takut ditertawakan orang?  

55  
00:05:17,760 --> 00:05:18,399  
Xiao Yan!  

56  
00:05:18,920 --> 00:05:20,839  
Kau... kau kenapa datang?  

57  
00:05:24,000 --> 00:05:24,759  
Ini Yanran.  

58  
00:05:26,120 --> 00:05:26,919  
Kita pernah kenal,  

59  
00:05:27,520 --> 00:05:28,319  
kau dalam kesulitan,  

60  
00:05:28,560 --> 00:05:29,839  
mana mungkin aku diam saja.  

61  
00:05:31,520 --> 00:05:33,399  
Orang... orang ini siapa?  

62  
00:05:33,800 --> 00:05:34,999  
Sepertinya teman Yun Yun.  

63  
00:05:35,120 --> 00:05:36,359  
Kekuatannya terlihat kuat.  

64  
00:05:39,400 --> 00:05:39,919  
Yun Yun,  

65  
00:05:40,520 --> 00:05:42,239  
katanya tak mengincar posisi Ketua,  

66  
00:05:42,600 --> 00:05:43,759  
tapi sudah bawa bala bantuan.  

67  
00:05:44,840 --> 00:05:45,599  
Baiklah,  

68  
00:05:46,160 --> 00:05:47,559  
kalian berdua boleh lawan bersama,  

69  
00:05:48,120 --> 00:05:49,919  
biar tak ada yang bilang kami menindas.  

70  
00:05:51,720 --> 00:05:52,119  
Xiao Yan,  

71  
00:05:52,720 --> 00:05:53,959  
kau tak perlu ikut campur.  

72  
00:05:55,120 --> 00:05:55,559  
Tenang,  

73  
00:05:56,120 --> 00:05:57,919  
Yanran sudah ceritakan semuanya padaku.  

74  
00:06:01,600 --> 00:06:02,319  
Jika mau uji kekuatan,  

75  
00:06:02,680 --> 00:06:03,519  
aku siap.  

76  
00:06:04,120 --> 00:06:05,199  
Tapi menang atau kalah,  

77  
00:06:05,520 --> 00:06:06,199  
kalian tak kehilangan apa-apa.  

78  
00:06:07,200 --> 00:06:08,159  
Sangat tidak adil.  

79  
00:06:09,800 --> 00:06:10,199  
Begini saja,  

80  
00:06:10,880 --> 00:06:11,599  
jika kalian kalah,  

81  
00:06:12,200 --> 00:06:14,639  
posisi Ketua Flower Sect diserahkan ke Yun Yun.  

82  
00:06:16,520 --> 00:06:17,599  
Kau siapa?  

83  
00:06:17,840 --> 00:06:19,119  
Berani menawar syarat!  

84  
00:06:20,520 --> 00:06:22,199  
Flower Sect terlalu arogan,  

85  
00:06:22,680 --> 00:06:24,439  
anggap Starfall Pavilion tak ada orang?  

86  
00:06:26,520 --> 00:06:27,639  
Kau dari Starfall Pavilion?  

87  
00:06:29,520 --> 00:06:30,319  
Aku Xiao Yan,  

88  
00:06:30,600 --> 00:06:31,679  
Pangeran Muda Starfall Pavilion.  

89  
00:06:32,120 --> 00:06:32,799  
Guruku Yao Chen.  

90  
00:06:33,760 --> 00:06:34,399  
Sebelum berangkat,  

91  
00:06:34,680 --> 00:06:35,319  
guru berpesan,  

92  
00:06:35,840 --> 00:06:37,559  
jika bertemu Senior Qing Xianzi,  

93  
00:06:37,960 --> 00:06:38,799  
sampaikan salam untuknya.  

94  
00:06:40,040 --> 00:06:41,799  
Dia ternyata Pangeran Muda Starfall Pavilion!  

95  
00:06:42,160 --> 00:06:44,119  
Elder Tertinggi Qing Xianzi dan Yao Zunzhe  

96  
00:06:44,520 --> 00:06:45,559  
hubungannya sangat dekat.  

97  
00:06:46,320 --> 00:06:47,839  
Jadi murid Yao Zunzhe.  

98  
00:06:48,640 --> 00:06:49,519  
Dia baik hati.  

99  
00:06:50,280 --> 00:06:51,519  
Jika ada kesempatan,  

100  
00:06:51,800 --> 00:06:55,239  
akan kusampaikan salam ini ke Elder Qing Xianzi."},{"role":"user","content":"101
00:06:58,760 --> 00:06:59,959
你就是萧炎

102
00:07:01,240 --> 00:07:02,599
你的要求我答应了

103
00:07:04,760 --> 00:07:06,719
我倒要看看药尊者的弟子

104
00:07:07,240 --> 00:07:08,519
能有几分本事

105
00:07:10,760 --> 00:07:12,319
你还未炼化花婆婆的斗气

106
00:07:12,760 --> 00:07:13,559
不是他们的对手

107
00:07:14,400 --> 00:07:14,959
让我来吧

108
00:07:16,520 --> 00:07:17,599
花锦是四星斗尊

109
00:07:18,320 --> 00:07:20,159
那妖花邪君是六星斗尊

110
00:07:21,120 --> 00:07:22,879
凭你一人可不是他们的对手

111
00:07:24,640 --> 00:07:25,839
你去对付云韵

112
00:07:26,320 --> 00:07:27,839
这小子交给我

113
00:07:54,920 --> 00:07:55,399
六合火

114
00:08:06,120 --> 00:08:07,519
我还真是小看你了

115
00:08:11,720 --> 00:08:12,879
本宗倒要看看

116
00:08:13,240 --> 00:08:15,399
那个老太婆究竟看上你哪一点

117
00:08:37,520 --> 00:08:38,679
哪里来的破傀儡

118
00:08:47,000 --> 00:08:49,319
萧炎竟能释放出斗尊级别的傀儡

119
00:08:55,120 --> 00:08:55,759
妖郎

120
00:09:01,720 --> 00:09:02,159
花锦

121
00:09:02,720 --> 00:09:03,759
你先拖住那傀儡

122
00:09:04,200 --> 00:09:05,239
待我擒住这小子

123
00:09:05,360 --> 00:09:06,279
那愧仙自会停止

124
00:09:17,440 --> 00:09:18,919
不愧是药尊者的弟子

125
00:09:19,560 --> 00:09:20,759
一个二星斗尊

126
00:09:21,040 --> 00:09:22,959
竟能让六星斗尊束手无策

127
00:09:30,080 --> 00:09:33,399
我会让你明白我们之间真正的差距

128
00:09:47,800 --> 00:09:49,199
天火三玄变

129
00:09:56,120 --> 00:09:57,079
第三变

130
00:10:17,400 --> 00:10:19,079
居然倚仗焚炎谷的秘法

131
00:10:19,400 --> 00:10:20,919
瞬间提高到四星斗尊

132
00:10:33,840 --> 00:10:36,119
这花锦看来是要抵挡不住了

133
00:10:37,040 --> 00:10:37,679
很好

134
00:10:38,520 --> 00:10:39,719
今天就速战速决

135
00:10:40,320 --> 00:10:42,879
让你见识一下本尊的气化天地

136
00:11:26,720 --> 00:11:28,039
速战速决吗

137
00:11:28,880 --> 00:11:29,639
正合我意

138
00:11:30,160 --> 00:11:30,719
异火

139
00:11:43,440 --> 00:11:46,119
他又要施展那东西了吗

140
00:11:46,320 --> 00:11:48,119
他竟然能融合四种异火

141
00:11:48,920 --> 00:11:51,679
这星陨阁少阁主果真不是白叫的

142
00:12:04,520 --> 00:12:05,919
当年的小小大斗师

143
00:12:06,800 --> 00:12:09,599
如今却有足以戏耍六星斗尊强者的实力了

144
00:12:10,920 --> 00:12:12,279

145
00:12:13,160 --> 00:12:14,879

146
00:12:15,680 --> 00:12:17,359

147
00:12:21,720 --> 00:12:23,919
今日这两人怕是要毁了我花宗

148

149
00:12:25,720 --> 00:12:26,159
结阵

150
00:12:38,720 --> 00:12:40,319
本尊今天就要看看

151
00:12:41,120 --> 00:12:42,719
到底是你的异火厉害

152
00:12:43,040 --> 00:12:46,399

153
00:13:06,440 --> 00:13:08,799

154
00:13:09,840 --> 00:13:10,279
去吧

155
00:13:11,080 --> 00:13:12,119
毁灭火莲

156
00:13:28,040 --> 00:13:30,399
这便是六星斗尊的全力一击么

157
00:13:31,400 --> 00:13:31,839
去吧

158
00:14:01,760 --> 00:14:03,279

159
00:14:03,760 --> 00:14:05,399
根本不堪一击

160
00:14:15,360 --> 00:14:15,719
破

161
00:14:58,440 --> 00:14:59,119
你没事吧

162
00:14:59,880 --> 00:15:00,159
无碍

163
00:15:04,640 --> 00:15:05,119
妖郎

164
00:15:08,440 --> 00:15:09,239
幸亏大长老出手

165
00:15:09,960 --> 00:15:11,919
否则我们花宗怕是不保啊

166
00:15:12,560 --> 00:15:15,239
这萧炎果然如同传闻中一般厉害

167
00:15:15,680 --> 00:15:17,799
居然能打败六星斗尊的妖花邪君

168
00:15:19,200 --> 00:15:19,799
萧炎

169
00:15:20,560 --> 00:15:22,359
你释放此等威力的斗技

170
00:15:22,720 --> 00:15:24,239
是想毁了我花宗不成

171
00:15:25,600 --> 00:15:26,279

172
00:15:26,520 --> 00:15:27,519
还望前辈莫怪

173
00:15:29,720 --> 00:15:31,999
看在药尊者和星陨阁的份上

174
00:15:32,480 --> 00:15:33,519
我就不追究了

175
00:15:37,760 --> 00:15:38,719
按照约定

176
00:15:38,920 --> 00:15:42,079
将代表宗主身份的玉牌交给云韵吧

177
00:15:46,800 --> 00:15:48,079

178
00:15:48,640 --> 00:15:50,839

179
00:15:51,120 --> 00:15:52,119

180
00:16:02,120 --> 00:16:02,799
收下吧

181

老宗主的眼光不会错的

182
00:16:06,920 --> 00:16:08,399
她毕生斗气都给了你

183
00:16:08,880 --> 00:16:12,879
想必你就是她心中继承宗主之位的完美人选

184
00:16:14,120 --> 00:16:14,599
收下吧

185
00:16:15,320 --> 00:16:16,919

186
00:16:22,920 --> 00:16:23,759
大长老

187
00:16:24,520 --> 00:16:28,839
花宗与我天冥宗是要成为盟友还是敌人

188
00:16:29,120 --> 00:16:30,159
你可要想清楚

189
00:16:34,560 --> 00:16:35,879
天冥宗行事

190
00:16:36,120 --> 00:16:36,759
想必各位都很清楚

191
00:16:38,200 --> 00:16:39,519
若花宗真与其结了盟

192
00:16:40,520 --> 00:16:41,479
恐怕过不了多久

193
00:16:42,040 --> 00:16:44,319
花宗就会成为天冥宗的另一处分宗

194
00:16:46,400 --> 00:16:48,639
萧炎

195
00:16:49,880 --> 00:16:50,879
若大长老不嫌弃

196
00:16:51,440 --> 00:16:52,719
待云韵成为宗主之后

197
00:16:53,240 --> 00:16:55,879
我星陨阁便是花宗最可靠的盟友

198
00:16:59,160 --> 00:17:00,799

199
00:17:01,080 --> 00:17:02,319
放眼整个中州

200
00:17:02,480 --> 00:17:03,519

benda"},{"mandarin":"噬石魔蚁","translate_to":"Semut Pemakan Batu","detail":"nama monster"},{"mandarin":"噬石蚁后","translate_to":"Ratu Semut Pemakan Batu","detail":"nama monster"},{"mandarin":"阵法","translate_to":"Formasi...","detail":"istilah/teknik"},{"mandarin":"宗","translate_to":"Sekte","detail":"istilah"}]}"},{"role":"user","content":"51
00:04:53,200 --> 00:04:54,599
这可是你自找的

52
00:05:09,680 --> 00:05:10,959
你以代宗主自居

53
00:05:11,400 --> 00:05:12,479
却以多欺少

54
00:05:13,200 --> 00:05:14,999
也不怕别人笑掉大牙

55
00:05:17,760 --> 00:05:18,399
萧炎

56
00:05:18,920 --> 00:05:20,839
你 你怎么来了

57
00:05:24,000 --> 00:05:24,759
是嫣然

58
00:05:26,120 --> 00:05:26,919
相识一场

59
00:05:27,520 --> 00:05:28,319
你遇到麻烦

60
00:05:28,560 --> 00:05:29,839
我总不能袖手旁观吧

61
00:05:31,520 --> 00:05:33,399
这 这人是谁啊

62
00:05:33,800 --> 00:05:34,999
看来是云韵的朋友

63
00:05:35,120 --> 00:05:36,359
实力很强的样子

64
00:05:39,400 --> 00:05:39,919
云韵

65
00:05:40,520 --> 00:05:42,239
你还说对宗主之位没有念想

66
00:05:42,600 --> 00:05:43,759
连帮手都找来了

67
00:05:44,840 --> 00:05:45,599
也罢

68
00:05:46,160 --> 00:05:47,559
那就你二人一起上

69
00:05:48,120 --> 00:05:49,919
免得有人说我们以多欺少

70
00:05:51,720 --> 00:05:52,119
萧炎

71
00:05:52,720 --> 00:05:53,959
你不用来蹭这浑水的

72
00:05:55,120 --> 00:05:55,559
放心吧

73
00:05:56,120 --> 00:05:57,919
详细情况媽然都和我说过了

74
00:06:01,600 --> 00:06:02,319
要比试

75
00:06:02,680 --> 00:06:03,519
我自然没问题

76
00:06:04,120 --> 00:06:05,199
不过无论输赢

77
00:06:05,520 --> 00:06:06,199
你们都没有任何损失

78
00:06:07,200 --> 00:06:08,159
未免太可笑

79
00:06:09,800 --> 00:06:10,199
这样吧

80
00:06:10,880 --> 00:06:11,599
若你们输了

81
00:06:12,200 --> 00:06:14,639
花宗宗主之位就交给云韵

82
00:06:16,520 --> 00:06:17,599
你算什么东西

83
00:06:17,840 --> 00:06:19,119
也配跟我提条件

84
00:06:20,520 --> 00:06:22,199
花宗如此盛气凌人

85
00:06:22,680 --> 00:06:24,439
真当我星陨阁无人不成

86
00:06:26,520 --> 00:06:27,639
你是星陨阁的人

87
00:06:29,520 --> 00:06:30,319
在下萧炎

88
00:06:30,600 --> 00:06:31,679
星陨阁少阁主

89
00:06:32,120 --> 00:06:32,799
家师药尘

90
00:06:33,760 --> 00:06:34,399
此行出来

91
00:06:34,680 --> 00:06:35,319
老师吩咐我

92
00:06:35,840 --> 00:06:37,559
若遇见花宗青仙子前辈

93
00:06:37,960 --> 00:06:38,799
代他问一声好

94
00:06:40,040 --> 00:06:41,799
他竟然就是星陨阁少阁主

95
00:06:42,160 --> 00:06:44,119
太上长老青仙子和药尊者

96
00:06:44,520 --> 00:06:45,559
关系可不一般啊

97
00:06:46,320 --> 00:06:47,839
原来是药尊者的弟子

98
00:06:48,640 --> 00:06:49,519
他有心了

99
00:06:50,280 --> 00:06:51,519
日后若有机会

100
00:06:51,800 --> 00:06:55,239
我定会向太上长老青仙子转达问候
"},{"role":"assistant","content":"51  
00:04:53,200 --> 00:04:54,599  
Ini kau yang minta!  

52  
00:05:09,680 --> 00:05:10,959  
Kau mengaku sebagai Ketua Sementara,  

53  
00:05:11,400 --> 00:05:12,479  
tapi menindas dengan jumlah personel,  

54  
00:05:13,200 --> 00:05:14,999  
tidak takut ditertawakan orang?  

55  
00:05:17,760 --> 00:05:18,399  
Xiao Yan!  

56  
00:05:18,920 --> 00:05:20,839  
Kau... kau kenapa datang?  

57  
00:05:24,000 --> 00:05:24,759  
Ini Yanran.  

58  
00:05:26,120 --> 00:05:26,919  
Kita pernah kenal,  

59  
00:05:27,520 --> 00:05:28,319  
kau dalam kesulitan,  

60  
00:05:28,560 --> 00:05:29,839  
mana mungkin aku diam saja.  

61  
00:05:31,520 --> 00:05:33,399  
Orang... orang ini siapa?  

62  
00:05:33,800 --> 00:05:34,999  
Sepertinya teman Yun Yun.  

63  
00:05:35,120 --> 00:05:36,359  
Kekuatannya terlihat kuat.  

64  
00:05:39,400 --> 00:05:39,919  
Yun Yun,  

65  
00:05:40,520 --> 00:05:42,239  
katanya tak mengincar posisi Ketua,  

66  
00:05:42,600 --> 00:05:43,759  
tapi sudah bawa bala bantuan.  

67  
00:05:44,840 --> 00:05:45,599  
Baiklah,  

68  
00:05:46,160 --> 00:05:47,559  
kalian berdua boleh lawan bersama,  

69  
00:05:48,120 --> 00:05:49,919  
biar tak ada yang bilang kami menindas.  

70  
00:05:51,720 --> 00:05:52,119  
Xiao Yan,  

71  
00:05:52,720 --> 00:05:53,959  
kau tak perlu ikut campur.  

72  
00:05:55,120 --> 00:05:55,559  
Tenang,  

73  
00:05:56,120 --> 00:05:57,919  
Yanran sudah ceritakan semuanya padaku.  

74  
00:06:01,600 --> 00:06:02,319  
Jika mau uji kekuatan,  

75  
00:06:02,680 --> 00:06:03,519  
aku siap.  

76  
00:06:04,120 --> 00:06:05,199  
Tapi menang atau kalah,  

77  
00:06:05,520 --> 00:06:06,199  
kalian tak kehilangan apa-apa.  

78  
00:06:07,200 --> 00:06:08,159  
Sangat tidak adil.  

79  
00:06:09,800 --> 00:06:10,199  
Begini saja,  

80  
00:06:10,880 --> 00:06:11,599  
jika kalian kalah,  

81  
00:06:12,200 --> 00:06:14,639  
posisi Ketua Flower Sect diserahkan ke Yun Yun.  

82  
00:06:16,520 --> 00:06:17,599  
Kau siapa?  

83  
00:06:17,840 --> 00:06:19,119  
Berani menawar syarat!  

84  
00:06:20,520 --> 00:06:22,199  
Flower Sect terlalu arogan,  

85  
00:06:22,680 --> 00:06:24,439  
anggap Starfall Pavilion tak ada orang?  

86  
00:06:26,520 --> 00:06:27,639  
Kau dari Starfall Pavilion?  

87  
00:06:29,520 --> 00:06:30,319  
Aku Xiao Yan,  

88  
00:06:30,600 --> 00:06:31,679  
Pangeran Muda Starfall Pavilion.  

89  
00:06:32,120 --> 00:06:32,799  
Guruku Yao Chen.  

90  
00:06:33,760 --> 00:06:34,399  
Sebelum berangkat,  

91  
00:06:34,680 --> 00:06:35,319  
guru berpesan,  

92  
00:06:35,840 --> 00:06:37,559  
jika bertemu Senior Qing Xianzi,  

93  
00:06:37,960 --> 00:06:38,799  
sampaikan salam untuknya.  

94  
00:06:40,040 --> 00:06:41,799  
Dia ternyata Pangeran Muda Starfall Pavilion!  

95  
00:06:42,160 --> 00:06:44,119  
Elder Tertinggi Qing Xianzi dan Yao Zunzhe  

96  
00:06:44,520 --> 00:06:45,559  
hubungannya sangat dekat.  

97  
00:06:46,320 --> 00:06:47,839  
Jadi murid Yao Zunzhe.  

98  
00:06:48,640 --> 00:06:49,519  
Dia baik hati.  

99  
00:06:50,280 --> 00:06:51,519  
Jika ada kesempatan,  

100  
00:06:51,800 --> 00:06:55,239  
akan kusampaikan salam ini ke Elder Qing Xianzi."},{"role":"user","content":"101
00:06:58,760 --> 00:06:59,959
你就是萧炎

102
00:07:01,240 --> 00:07:02,599
你的要求我答应了

103
00:07:04,760 --> 00:07:06,719
我倒要看看药尊者的弟子

104
00:07:07,240 --> 00:07:08,519
能有几分本事

105
00:07:10,760 --> 00:07:12,319
你还未炼化花婆婆的斗气

106
00:07:12,760 --> 00:07:13,559
不是他们的对手

107
00:07:14,400 --> 00:07:14,959
让我来吧

108
00:07:16,520 --> 00:07:17,599
花锦是四星斗尊

109
00:07:18,320 --> 00:07:20,159
那妖花邪君是六星斗尊

110
00:07:21,120 --> 00:07:22,879
凭你一人可不是他们的对手

111
00:07:24,640 --> 00:07:25,839
你去对付云韵

112
00:07:26,320 --> 00:07:27,839
这小子交给我

113
00:07:54,920 --> 00:07:55,399
六合火

114
00:08:06,120 --> 00:08:07,519
我还真是小看你了

115
00:08:11,720 --> 00:08:12,879
本宗倒要看看

116
00:08:13,240 --> 00:08:15,399
那个老太婆究竟看上你哪一点

117
00:08:37,520 --> 00:08:38,679
哪里来的破傀儡

118
00:08:47,000 --> 00:08:49,319
萧炎竟能释放出斗尊级别的傀儡

119
00:08:55,120 --> 00:08:55,759
妖郎

120
00:09:01,720 --> 00:09:02,159
花锦

121
00:09:02,720 --> 00:09:03,759
你先拖住那傀儡

122
00:09:04,200 --> 00:09:05,239
待我擒住这小子

123
00:09:05,360 --> 00:09:06,279
那愧仙自会停止

124
00:09:17,440 --> 00:09:18,919
不愧是药尊者的弟子

125
00:09:19,560 --> 00:09:20,759
一个二星斗尊

126
00:09:21,040 --> 00:09:22,959
竟能让六星斗尊束手无策

127
00:09:30,080 --> 00:09:33,399
我会让你明白我们之间真正的差距

128
00:09:47,800 --> 00:09:49,199
天火三玄变

129
00:09:56,120 --> 00:09:57,079
第三变

130
00:10:17,400 --> 00:10:19,079
居然倚仗焚炎谷的秘法

131
00:10:19,400 --> 00:10:20,919
瞬间提高到四星斗尊

132
00:10:33,840 --> 00:10:36,119
这花锦看来是要抵挡不住了

133
00:10:37,040 --> 00:10:37,679
很好

134
00:10:38,520 --> 00:10:39,719
今天就速战速决

135
00:10:40,320 --> 00:10:42,879
让你见识一下本尊的气化天地

136
00:11:26,720 --> 00:11:28,039
速战速决吗

137
00:11:28,880 --> 00:11:29,639
正合我意

138
00:11:30,160 --> 00:11:30,719
异火

139
00:11:43,440 --> 00:11:46,119
他又要施展那东西了吗

140
00:11:46,320 --> 00:11:48,119
他竟然能融合四种异火

141
00:11:48,920 --> 00:11:51,679
这星陨阁少阁主果真不是白叫的

142
00:12:04,520 --> 00:12:05,919
当年的小小大斗师

143
00:12:06,800 --> 00:12:09,599
如今却有足以戏耍六星斗尊强者的实力了

144
00:12:10,920 --> 00:12:12,279
好像从我们结识起

145
00:12:13,160 --> 00:12:14,879
你就不断地在颠覆我的认知

146
00:12:15,680 --> 00:12:17,359
创造了一个又一个奇迹

147
00:12:21,720 --> 00:12:23,919
今日这两人怕是要毁了我花宗

148
00:12:24,560 --> 00:12:25,479
众弟子听令

149
00:12:25,720 --> 00:12:26,159
结阵

150
00:12:38,720 --> 00:12:40,319
本尊今天就要看看
"},{"role":"assistant","content":"101  
00:06:58,760 --> 00:06:59,959  
Jadi kau adalah Xiao Yan?  

102  
00:07:01,240 --> 00:07:02,599  
Permintaanmu kuterima.  

103  
00:07:04,760 --> 00:07:06,719  
Aku ingin lihat seberapa hebat murid Yao Zunzhe ini.  

104  
00:07:07,240 --> 00:07:08,519  
Bisa apa kau sebenarnya?  

105  
00:07:10,760 --> 00:07:12,319  
Kau belum menyatukan Dou Qi Nenek Hua,  

106  
00:07:12,760 --> 00:07:13,559  
bukan lawan mereka.  

107  
00:07:14,400 --> 00:07:14,959  
Biarkan aku yang menangani ini.  

108  
00:07:16,520 --> 00:07:17,599  
Hua Jin adalah Dou Zun 4-bintang.  

109  
00:07:18,320 --> 00:07:20,159  
Yao Hua Xie Jun adalah Dou Zun 6-bintang.  

110  
00:07:21,120 --> 00:07:22,879  
Kau sendirian tak mungkin menang.  

111  
00:07:24,640 --> 00:07:25,839  
Kau urus Yun Yun.  

112  
00:07:26,320 --> 00:07:27,839  
Biarkan aku yang menghadapi anak ini.  

113  
00:07:54,920 --> 00:07:55,399  
Six Harmonies Fire!  

114  
00:08:06,120 --> 00:08:07,519  
Aku meremehkanmu.  

115  
00:08:11,720 --> 00:08:12,879  
Aku ingin tahu,  

116  
00:08:13,240 --> 00:08:15,399  
kelebihan apa yang dilihat nenek tua itu padamu?  

117  
00:08:37,520 --> 00:08:38,679  
Boneka rusak macam apa ini?  

118  
00:08:47,000 --> 00:08:49,319  
Xiao Yan bisa mengeluarkan boneka level Dou Zun?  

119  
00:08:55,120 --> 00:08:55,759  
Suamiku!  

120  
00:09:01,720 --> 00:09:02,159  
Hua Jin!  

121  
00:09:02,720 --> 00:09:03,759  
Tahan boneka itu dulu.  

122  
00:09:04,200 --> 00:09:05,239  
Biarkan aku menangkap anak ini,  

123  
00:09:05,360 --> 00:09:06,279  
bonekanya akan berhenti sendiri.  

124  
00:09:17,440 --> 00:09:18,919  
Pantas jadi murid Yao Zunzhe.  

125  
00:09:19,560 --> 00:09:20,759  
Dou Zun 2-bintang  

126  
00:09:21,040 --> 00:09:22,959  
bisa membuat Dou Zun 6-bintang kewalahan.  

127  
00:09:30,080 --> 00:09:33,399  
Akan kuperlihatkan perbedaan sebenarnya antara kita.  

128  
00:09:47,800 --> 00:09:49,199  
Skyfire Three Mysterious Change!  

129  
00:09:56,120 --> 00:09:57,079  
Perubahan Ketiga!  

130  
00:10:17,400 --> 00:10:19,079  
Mengandalkan teknik rahasia Burning Flame Valley,  

131  
00:10:19,400 --> 00:10:20,919  
langsung naik ke Dou Zun 4-bintang.  

132  
00:10:33,840 --> 00:10:36,119  
Hua Jin mulai terdesak.  

133  
00:10:37,040 --> 00:10:37,679  
Bagus!  

134  
00:10:38,520 --> 00:10:39,719  
Hari ini kita selesaikan cepat.  

135  
00:10:40,320 --> 00:10:42,879  
Kuperlihatkan "Qi Transforms Heaven and Earth"-ku!  

136  
00:11:26,720 --> 00:11:28,039  
Selesaikan cepat?  

137  
00:11:28,880 --> 00:11:29,639  
Tepat seperti keinginanku.  

138  
00:11:30,160 --> 00:11:30,719  
Heavenly Flame!  

139  
00:11:43,440 --> 00:11:46,119  
Dia akan menggunakan itu lagi?  

140  
00:11:46,320 --> 00:11:48,119  
Dia bisa menyatukan 4 Heavenly Flame?!  

141  
00:11:48,920 --> 00:11:51,679  
Pangeran Muda Starfall Pavilion memang bukan sebutan kosong.  

142  
00:12:04,520 --> 00:12:05,919  
Dulu hanya Da Dou Shi kecil,  

143  
00:12:06,800 --> 00:12:09,599  
sekarang bisa mempermainkan Dou Zun 6-bintang.  

144  
00:12:10,920 --> 00:12:12,279  
Sejak kita bertemu,  

145  
00:12:13,160 --> 00:12:14,879  
kau terus mengejutkanku.  

146  
00:12:15,680 --> 00:12:17,359  
Menciptakan keajaiban demi keajaiban.  

147  
00:12:21,720 --> 00:12:23,919  
Hari ini mereka akan menghancurkan Flower Sect.  

148  
00:12:24,560 --> 00:12:25,479  
Semua murid, perintahku!  

149  
00:12:25,720 --> 00:12:26,159  
Bentuk formasi!  

150  
00:12:38,720 --> 00:12:40,319  
Hari ini akan kulihat..."},{"role":"user","content":"151
00:12:41,120 --> 00:12:42,719
到底是你的异火厉害

152
00:12:43,040 --> 00:12:46,399
还是本尊的气化天地更胜一筹

153
00:13:06,440 --> 00:13:08,799
这便是六星斗尊的全力一击么

154
00:13:09,840 --> 00:13:10,279
去吧

155
00:13:11,080 --> 00:13:12,119
毁灭火莲

156
00:13:28,040 --> 00:13:30,399
这便是六星斗尊的全力一击么

157
00:13:31,400 --> 00:13:31,839
去吧

158
00:14:01,760 --> 00:14:03,279
什么毁灭火莲

159
00:14:03,760 --> 00:14:05,399
根本不堪一击

160
00:14:15,360 --> 00:14:15,719
破

161
00:14:58,440 --> 00:14:59,119
你没事吧

162
00:14:59,880 --> 00:15:00,159
无碍

163
00:15:04,640 --> 00:15:05,119
妖郎

164
00:15:08,440 --> 00:15:09,239
幸亏大长老出手

165
00:15:09,960 --> 00:15:11,919
否则我们花宗怕是不保啊

166
00:15:12,560 --> 00:15:15,239
这萧炎果然如同传闻中一般厉害

167
00:15:15,680 --> 00:15:17,799
居然能打败六星斗尊的妖花邪君

168
00:15:19,200 --> 00:15:19,799
萧炎

169
00:15:20,560 --> 00:15:22,359
你释放此等威力的斗技

170
00:15:22,720 --> 00:15:24,239
是想毁了我花宗不成

171
00:15:25,600 --> 00:15:26,279
事态紧急

172
00:15:26,520 --> 00:15:27,519
还望前辈莫怪

173
00:15:29,720 --> 00:15:31,999
看在药尊者和星陨阁的份上

174
00:15:32,480 --> 00:15:33,519
我就不追究了

175
00:15:37,760 --> 00:15:38,719
按照约定

176
00:15:38,920 --> 00:15:42,079
将代表宗主身份的玉牌交给云韵吧

177
00:15:46,800 --> 00:15:48,079
我来花宗时日不长

178
00:15:48,640 --> 00:15:50,839
也没有对花宗作出过卓越贡献

179
00:15:51,120 --> 00:15:52,119
受之有愧

180
00:16:02,120 --> 00:16:02,799
收下吧

181
00:16:03,680 --> 00:16:05,639
老宗主的眼光不会错的

182
00:16:06,920 --> 00:16:08,399
她毕生斗气都给了你

183
00:16:08,880 --> 00:16:12,879
想必你就是她心中继承宗主之位的完美人选

184
00:16:14,120 --> 00:16:14,599
收下吧

185
00:16:15,320 --> 00:16:16,919
别辜负了老宗主的一片心意

186
00:16:22,920 --> 00:16:23,759
大长老

187
00:16:24,520 --> 00:16:28,839
花宗与我天冥宗是要成为盟友还是敌人

188
00:16:29,120 --> 00:16:30,159
你可要想清楚

189
00:16:34,560 --> 00:16:35,879
天冥宗行事

190
00:16:36,120 --> 00:16:36,759
想必各位都很清楚

191
00:16:38,200 --> 00:16:39,519
若花宗真与其结了盟

192
00:16:40,520 --> 00:16:41,479
恐怕过不了多久

193
00:16:42,040 --> 00:16:44,319
花宗就会成为天冥宗的另一处分宗

194
00:16:46,400 --> 00:16:48,639
萧炎

195
00:16:49,880 --> 00:16:50,879
若大长老不嫌弃

196
00:16:51,440 --> 00:16:52,719
待云韵成为宗主之后

197
00:16:53,240 --> 00:16:55,879
我星陨阁便是花宗最可靠的盟友

198
00:16:59,160 --> 00:17:00,799
药尊者的显赫声名

199
00:17:01,080 --> 00:17:02,319
放眼整个中州

200
00:17:02,480 --> 00:17:03,519
谁人不知
"},{"role":"assistant","content":"151  
00:12:41,120 --> 00:12:42,719  
Mana yang lebih kuat,  

152  
00:12:43,040 --> 00:12:46,399  
Heavenly Flame-mu atau "Qi Transforms Heaven and Earth"-ku?  

153  
00:13:06,440 --> 00:13:08,799  
Inikah serangan penuh Dou Zun 6-bintang?  

154  
00:13:09,840 --> 00:13:10,279  
Pergilah!  

155  
00:13:11,080 --> 00:13:12,119  
Annihilation Fire Lotus!  

156  
00:13:28,040 --> 00:13:30,399  
Inikah serangan penuh Dou Zun 6-bintang?  

157  
00:13:31,400 --> 00:13:31,839  
Pergilah!  

158  
00:14:01,760 --> 00:14:03,279  
Apa ini Annihilation Fire Lotus?  

159  
00:14:03,760 --> 00:14:05,399  
Sama sekali tak berarti!  

160  
00:14:15,360 --> 00:14:15,719  
Hancur!  

161  
00:14:58,440 --> 00:14:59,119  
Kau baik-baik saja?  

162  
00:14:59,880 --> 00:15:00,159  
Tidak apa.  

163  
00:15:04,640 --> 00:15:05,119  
Suamiku!  

164  
00:15:08,440 --> 00:15:09,239  
Untung Elder Tertinggi turun tangan,  

165  
00:15:09,960 --> 00:15:11,919  
kalau tidak, Flower Sect kami akan hancur.  

166  
00:15:12,560 --> 00:15:15,239  
Xiao Yan benar-benar sehebat kabar yang beredar.  

167  
00:15:15,680 --> 00:15:17,799  
Bisa mengalahkan Yao Hua Xie Jun yang Dou Zun 6-bintang.  

168  
00:15:19,200 --> 00:15:19,799  
Xiao Yan!  

169  
00:15:20,560 --> 00:15:22,359  
Kau menggunakan teknik sekuat ini,  

170  
00:15:22,720 --> 00:15:24,239  
apa maksudmu menghancurkan Flower Sect?  

171  
00:15:25,600 --> 00:15:26,279  
Keadaan darurat,  

172  
00:15:26,520 --> 00:15:27,519  
harap maklum, Senior.  

173  
00:15:29,720 --> 00:15:31,999  
Mengingat Yao Zunzhe dan Starfall Pavilion,  

174  
00:15:32,480 --> 00:15:33,519  
aku tak akan menuntut lebih jauh.  

175  
00:15:37,760 --> 00:15:38,719  
Sesuai kesepakatan,  

176  
00:15:38,920 --> 00:15:42,079  
serahkan Giang Ketua pada Yun Yun.  

177  
00:15:46,800 --> 00:15:48,079  
Aku belum lama di Flower Sect,  

178  
00:15:48,640 --> 00:15:50,839  
dan belum memberi kontribusi berarti.  

179  
00:15:51,120 --> 00:15:52,119  
Aku tak pantas menerimanya.  

180  
00:16:02,120 --> 00:16:02,799  
Terimalah.  

181  
00:16:03,680 --> 00:16:05,639  
Mantan Ketua tak mungkin salah menilai.  

182  
00:16:06,920 --> 00:16:08,399  
Dia memberikan seluruh Dou Qi-nya padamu,  

183  
00:16:08,880 --> 00:16:12,879  
pasti kau adalah penerus sempurna di hatinya.  

184  
00:16:14,120 --> 00:16:14,599  
Terimalah.  

185  
00:16:15,320 --> 00:16:16,919  
Jangan sia-siakan niat baiknya.  

186  
00:16:22,920 --> 00:16:23,759  
Elder Tertinggi,  

187  
00:16:24,520 --> 00:16:28,839  
apakah Flower Sect akan menjadi sekutu atau musuh Tianming Sect?  

188  
00:16:29,120 --> 00:16:30,159  
Pikirkan baik-baik.  

189  
00:16:34,560 --> 00:16:35,879  
Cara kerja Tianming Sect,  

190  
00:16:36,120 --> 00:16:36,759  
semua pasti sudah tahu.  

191  
00:16:38,200 --> 00:16:39,519  
Jika Flower Sect bersekutu dengan mereka,  

192  
00:16:40,520 --> 00:16:41,479  
tidak lama lagi,  

193  
00:16:42,040 --> 00:16:44,319  
Flower Sect akan jadi cabang mereka.  

194  
00:16:46,400 --> 00:16:48,639  
Xiao Yan,  

195  
00:16:49,880 --> 00:16:50,879  
jika Elder Tertinggi berkenan,  

196  
00:16:51,440 --> 00:16:52,719  
setelah Yun Yun jadi Ketua,  

197  
00:16:53,240 --> 00:16:55,879  
Starfall Pavilion akan menjadi sekutu terkuat Flower Sect.  

198  
00:16:59,160 --> 00:17:00,799  
Reputasi Yao Zunzhe,  

199  
00:17:01,080 --> 00:17:02,319  
di seluruh Central Plains,  

200  
00:17:02,480 --> 00:17:03,519  
siapa yang tak kenal?"},{"role":"user","content":"[Total Req: 5/5]
[max 50 lines/Req]

Terjemahkan, dan selalu gunakan tanda baca di tiap kalimat:
201
00:17:03,600 --> 00:17:04,479
何人不晓

202
00:17:05,440 --> 00:17:08,199
花宗能与拥有药尊者的星陨阁结盟

203
00:17:08,599 --> 00:17:09,838
自是最好不过

204
00:17:13,280 --> 00:17:15,479
既然大长老已经做了选择

205
00:17:16,079 --> 00:17:19,559
那本尊希望花宗不要后悔今天的决断

206
00:17:21,520 --> 00:17:22,879
我们会不会后悔

207
00:17:23,280 --> 00:17:25,519
就不劳烦你一个外人来费心了

208
00:17:27,680 --> 00:17:28,159
妖郎

209
00:17:30,880 --> 00:17:32,719
既然你们选择了星陨阁

210
00:17:33,320 --> 00:17:35,639
我们之间的关系便到此结束

211
00:17:36,280 --> 00:17:37,279
我天冥宗

212
00:17:37,480 --> 00:17:38,759
绝不会就此罢休

213
00:17:40,080 --> 00:17:40,519
妖郎

214
00:17:40,840 --> 00:17:41,639
你不能丢下我

215
00:17:52,880 --> 00:17:53,919
从今日起

216
00:17:54,560 --> 00:17:57,359
云韵便是我花宗新一代宗主

217
00:17:58,320 --> 00:18:00,519
她的施号就是宗门命令

218
00:18:01,120 --> 00:18:02,319
如有不从

219
00:18:02,640 --> 00:18:03,519
门规伺候

220
00:18:04,280 --> 00:18:05,839
见过宗主

221
00:18:17,960 --> 00:18:18,319
云韵
"}]

[{"role":"user","content":"1
00:00:07,320 --> 00:00:09,319
药尘成功重塑肉身

2
00:00:09,440 --> 00:00:11,119
晋级半圣强者

3
00:00:11,520 --> 00:00:14,199
重创魂殿八天尊与九天尊

4
00:00:14,320 --> 00:00:16,399
化解了星陨阁危机

5
00:00:17,200 --> 00:00:20,639
面对为救自己而付出一切的弟子萧炎

6
00:00:20,840 --> 00:00:23,479
药尘甚是欣慰与感激

7
00:00:23,840 --> 00:00:27,199
亲自将骨灵冷火传与萧炎

8
00:00:27,960 --> 00:00:30,319
而随后令人感到意外的是

9
00:00:30,600 --> 00:00:33,359
旧识纳兰媽然为了老师云韵

10
00:00:33,560 --> 00:00:35,599
竟然前来求助萧炎

11
00:00:36,600 --> 00:00:39,030
萧炎念及旧友之情

12
00:00:39,040 --> 00:00:41,599
同时也为了给星陨阁笼络盟友

13
00:00:41,960 --> 00:00:43,959
当即决定前往花宗

14
00:01:03,080 --> 00:01:03,359
骨灵冷火跟了老师这么多年

15
00:01:05,519 --> 00:01:08,399
不知道这抗性什么时候才能彻底消除

16
00:01:08,720 --> 00:01:09,519
萧炎少爷

17
00:01:10,120 --> 00:01:11,119
我们快到花宗了

18
00:01:13,080 --> 00:01:14,639
看来我修炼结束得正是时候

19
00:01:16,000 --> 00:01:16,879
青鳞说得没错

20
00:01:17,520 --> 00:01:20,359
不过我们也只是刚刚抵达花宗外围而已

21
00:01:42,600 --> 00:01:42,999
跟我来

22
00:01:53,520 --> 00:01:54,679
真是别有洞天

23
00:01:58,160 --> 00:01:59,239
好漂亮的地方

24
00:02:38,080 --> 00:02:39,119
这是护宗迷魂阵

25
00:02:39,960 --> 00:02:41,159
若有人擅闯花宗

26
00:02:41,560 --> 00:02:43,079
便会迷失在这片花海中

27
00:02:45,440 --> 00:02:46,319
比试快要开始了

28
00:02:48,720 --> 00:02:49,839
你们切记跟紧我

29
00:03:11,640 --> 00:03:12,519
时辰到了

30
00:03:26,400 --> 00:03:27,279
是云韵长老

31
00:03:27,520 --> 00:03:28,479
云韵长老来了

32
00:03:54,880 --> 00:03:55,439
云韵

33
00:03:56,160 --> 00:03:57,839
本宗当初好心收留你

34
00:03:58,840 --> 00:04:02,359
没想到你竟还妄想染指我花宗宗主之位

35
00:04:03,840 --> 00:04:04,959
宗主收留之情

36
00:04:05,400 --> 00:04:06,559
云韵铭记在心

37
00:04:07,240 --> 00:04:08,919
但我对宗主之位毫无念想

38
00:04:09,640 --> 00:04:10,999
你又何必苦苦相逼

39
00:04:13,800 --> 00:04:16,439
既然云韵是花婆婆看重之人

40
00:04:17,079 --> 00:04:18,279
你应放下争端

41
00:04:18,600 --> 00:04:19,919
以宗门利益为重

42
00:04:22,320 --> 00:04:25,519
想必花婆婆是被她惺惺作态所骗

43
00:04:26,280 --> 00:04:30,919
况且花宗老宗主的斗气怎能交予一个外人

44
00:04:33,520 --> 00:04:34,359
若真无念想

45
00:04:34,960 --> 00:04:37,639
就乖乖把老宗主的毕生斗气交出来

46
00:04:40,760 --> 00:04:42,319
若早知花婆婆是老宗主

47
00:04:43,040 --> 00:04:44,519
我定会将此事票告宗门

48
00:04:45,880 --> 00:04:48,479
那斗气已被花婆婆封印在我体内

49
00:04:49,160 --> 00:04:49,959
你若想要

50
00:04:50,320 --> 00:04:51,319
来取便是
"},{"role":"assistant","content":"Berikut terjemahan subtitle dalam format SRT:

1
00:00:07,320 --> 00:00:09,319
Yao Chen berhasil membentuk kembali tubuh fisiknya.

2
00:00:09,440 --> 00:00:11,119
Naik ke level Ban Sheng.

3
00:00:11,520 --> 00:00:14,199
Melukai berat Delapan Heavenly Venerate dan Sembilan Heavenly Venerate dari Hall of Soul.

4
00:00:14,320 --> 00:00:16,399
Mengatasi krisis Starfall Pavilion.

5
00:00:17,200 --> 00:00:20,639
Menghadapi muridnya Xiao Yan yang telah mengorbankan segalanya untuk menyelamatkannya,

6
00:00:20,840 --> 00:00:23,479
Yao Chen merasa sangat terharu dan bersyukur.

7
00:00:23,840 --> 00:00:27,199
Dia secara pribadi mewariskan Chilling Bone Flame kepada Xiao Yan.

8
00:00:27,960 --> 00:00:30,319
Kemudian yang mengejutkan,

9
00:00:30,600 --> 00:00:33,359
Nalan Yanran yang dulu dikenal datang meminta bantuan Xiao Yan demi gurunya Yun Yun.

10
00:00:33,560 --> 00:00:35,599
Xiao Yan mengingat persahabatan lama,

11
00:00:36,600 --> 00:00:39,030
dan juga untuk mencari sekutu bagi Starfall Pavilion,

12
00:00:39,040 --> 00:00:41,599
langsung memutuskan pergi ke Flower Sect.

13
00:00:41,960 --> 00:00:43,959
(Beberapa waktu kemudian)

14
00:01:03,080 --> 00:01:03,359
Chilling Bone Flame telah mengikuti guru selama bertahun-tahun.

15
00:01:05,519 --> 00:01:08,399
Aku tidak tahu kapan resistensi ini akan hilang sepenuhnya.

16
00:01:08,720 --> 00:01:09,519
Tuan muda Xiao Yan,

17
00:01:10,120 --> 00:01:11,119
kita hampir tiba di Flower Sect.

18
00:01:13,080 --> 00:01:14,639
Tampaknya latihanku selesai tepat waktu.

19
00:01:16,000 --> 00:01:16,879
Qing Ling benar,

20
00:01:17,520 --> 00:01:20,359
tapi kita baru sampai di pinggiran Flower Sect.

21
00:01:42,600 --> 00:01:42,999
Ikuti aku.

22
00:01:53,520 --> 00:01:54,679
Tempat yang sangat unik.

23
00:01:58,160 --> 00:01:59,239
Tempat yang indah.

24
00:02:38,080 --> 00:02:39,119
Ini Formasi Pembingungan Penjaga Sekte.

25
00:02:39,960 --> 00:02:41,159
Jika ada yang berani masuk tanpa izin,

26
00:02:41,560 --> 00:02:43,079
mereka akan tersesat di lautan bunga ini.

27
00:02:45,440 --> 00:02:46,319
Pertandingan akan segera dimulai.

28
00:02:48,720 --> 00:02:49,839
Ingat, tetap dekat denganku.

29
00:03:11,640 --> 00:03:12,519
Waktunya tiba.

30
00:03:26,400 --> 00:03:27,279
Itu Tetua Yun Yun!

31
00:03:27,520 --> 00:03:28,479
Tetua Yun Yun datang!

32
00:03:54,880 --> 00:03:55,439
Yun Yun!

33
00:03:56,160 --> 00:03:57,839
Awalnya aku menerimamu dengan baik,

34
00:03:58,840 --> 00:04:02,359
tapi kau berani mengincar posisi Ketua Sekte Flower Sect!

35
00:04:03,840 --> 00:04:04,959
Aku berterima kasih atas kebaikanmu,

36
00:04:05,400 --> 00:04:06,559
tapi aku tidak menginginkan posisi Ketua Sekte.

37
00:04:07,240 --> 00:04:08,919
Kenapa kau terus memaksaku?

38
00:04:09,640 --> 00:04:10,999
Yun Yun adalah orang yang dihormati Nenek Hua.

39
00:04:13,800 --> 00:04:16,439
Kau harus mengakhiri perselisihan ini

40
00:04:17,079 --> 00:04:18,279
dan memikirkan kepentingan sekte.

41
00:04:18,600 --> 00:04:19,919
Nenek Hua pasti tertipu oleh kepura-puraannya.

42
00:04:22,320 --> 00:04:25,519
Lagipula, Dou Qi mantan Ketua Sekte tidak boleh diberikan ke orang luar.

43
00:04:26,280 --> 00:04:30,919
Jika kau benar-benar tidak menginginkannya,

44
00:04:33,520 --> 00:04:34,359
serahkan saja Dou Qi Nenek Hua.

45
00:04:34,960 --> 00:04:37,639
Jika aku tahu Nenek Hua adalah mantan Ketua Sekte,

46
00:04:40,760 --> 00:04:42,319
aku pasti akan melaporkannya ke sekte.

47
00:04:43,040 --> 00:04:44,519
Dou Qi itu sudah disegel di tubuhku oleh Nenek Hua.

48
00:04:45,880 --> 00:04:48,479
Jika kau menginginkannya,

49
00:04:49,160 --> 00:04:49,959
ambil sendiri!

50
00:04:50,320 --> 00:04:51,319
(Suara efek)"}]
